column4: I want to change my user account's locale (LC_*=en_GB, but LC_CTYPE and some others to de_DE). How do I do that in Intrepid (what files do I have to edit)? Exporting the envs in .bashrc doesn't seem to do anything for GNOME.
That doesn't seem to do ANYTHING. I need something that lets me set the envs individually.
sorry, no experience as how to do exactly that...
